    • Constructor Detail

      • JailCell

        public JailCell(java.lang.String JailName,
        java.lang.String Player,
        java.lang.String Name)
        Parameters:
        Name - Name of the cell. Can be null if you don't want to specify one.
        JailName - Name of the jail that contains that cell
        Player - Name of the player that is jailed inside that cell. Make it empty string, if there is no such player.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        Name of the cell. It can be null or empty if cell does not have a name.
